abstract: A group gathers in San Francisco and expresses their feelings about Steve Jobs.
snippet: A group gathers in San Francisco and expresses their feelings about Steve Jobs.
lead_paragraph: At 9 p.m. on Wednesday in San Francisco, a few dozen start-up entrepreneurs, Apple employees and iPhone fans gathered in Dolores Park, the four-square-block park in the middle of the city's Mission district, home to hipsters and artists tethered to their MacBooks and iPhones.
